comments: Great at first but after a little time it gets a little boring. But it's still fun! And the bunny is so cute when we play in the park! Also there's nothing to do more than healing animals, taking their photo and playing in the park.

Ads pop up in the middle of you moving things to the animal. At least wait for then level or action to be completed. I know that the beginning of most games are free and that is appreciated, but at least let the player finish an action.

descriptionHTML:
Learn what it’s like to be a real-life veterinarian! Use 3D professional vet tools and become the best animal doctor around! Your adorable, cuddly animal patients aren’t feeling well, and they need YOU to treat them! Examine your furry patients real doctor equipment and help them until the feel all better!


Gain amazing vet skills by learning what it takes to be a real veterinarian! Become the favorite doctor of all the animals in town! The furry kitty, fluffy puppy and soft bunny all need your help! From a bad case of the flu, to nasty scrapes, these fuzzy cuties are all waiting for you to cure them! Challenging puzzles & fun matching games inside!


Features:
> Get ready to be the best veterinarian EVER! Treat the injured animals!
> Examine your furry friends with 3D professional vet tools!
> Dress the animals up in cute outfits & play with them at the park!
> Do challenging puzzles and matching games to find out what’s wrong with the animals!
> Kitty caught the flu! Make an adorable hat and scarf to warm her up!
> Bunny broke his leg! Put a cast on him!
> Puppy hasn’t been seeing so well – give him glasses!
> Kitty’s paw got hurt! Give her a bandaid!
> Tons of mini-games inside for you to enjoy!
> Hooray! You helped all your patients feel better! Now it’s time to play with them at the park!


ABOUT Coco Play
Coco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading, global creator of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.

description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:‚ñ∂ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!‚ñ∂ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!‚ñ∂ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking‚ñ∂ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!‚ñ∂ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.

Features:

▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking
▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!
▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!

Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.

Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.

Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!

descriptionHTML:
Take part in one of the BattleMinibots armoured car shows – spectacular robots fighting games of armoured car and robot warriors radio-guided vehicles. These indestructible battle cars are extremely dangerous, each with its unique weapon for death racing. Create your own armoured car minibot in the garage and upgrade its properties to make it to the try-out and become a member of the mech robot wars League!

Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!

Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot
Drillbot
Smile minibomb
Sawbot
Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. Earn experience points in robots fighting games and get access to minibot customization – new armour, weapons and styles for more breathtaking car wars game.

And remember: the more achievements you unlock, the better, as only the most persistent players will join the mech robot wars League. Let the car wars game start!
Activate your VIP-status, to unlock more game abilities.

Robot warriors war: be #1 in our worldwide leaderboard!

Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots is:

15+ robot warrior and super mechs with unique fighting mechanics, for extreme machines games
Personalization with the help of armour and weapons
Mighty iron warriors and thrilling robots vs robots PvP battle arena fights.

Breathtaking robots vs robots fights are waiting for you. Choose machines for a steel robot fighting and go to the battle arena!

Already playing Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots? Discuss the game and share your opinion in social networks:

on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/robotfighting2/

We look forward to your comments and suggestions for improving the game.

descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.
summary: Rock Paper Scissor is the best addictive app to settle your dispute in a fun way

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.Good luck and have a fun!
descriptionHTML:
Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.
The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.

In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.


Good luck and have a fun!

descriptionHTML:
It’s your day! You’ve just been discovered by the best hip hop talent agent! This game will help you improve your moves, gain fans and show ‘em you’re the hottest hip hop dancer! Dress in street style, choreograph your own dance & climb the ranks at the big show!


LOVE to dance hip hop and want to show the world what you’ve got? This is the game for you! Hip Hop Dance School will give you the skills to choreograph your moves and STAND OUT on stage! Choose your outfit and crew members for the PERFECT performance! You’ve got to uphold your star reputation! Impress the judges and work your way UP the competition!


Features:
> Get your dancing shoes on & dance your heart out in this game, at the famous Hip Hop Show!
> Follow your mentor’s instructions as you make a name for yourself in the hip hop scene!
> Gain mad skills at the dance school as you climb the charts and score awesome prizes!
> Get inspired by your competitors’ dancing clips!
> Be part of an awesome dance crew and learn to choreograph your own moves at the school!
> Get a to-die-for makeover and dress up in the coolest hip hop getups!
> Are you ready for the big show? Get in shape at the gym! Try the cool freeze balance workout!
> Uh-oh! Dance injury! Go to the doctor and get better! Your crew’s counting on you!
> For the performance of a lifetime, you’ll need a great hairstyle! Get your hair done at the salon.
> After an intense day at dance school, relax yourself at the spa & get rid of any pre-show jitters.
> Show off your killer hip hop moves while your biggest fans cheer you on!
> Do your best to impress the judges and get the top score!

comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

Pretty decent game, couple of suggestions though: instead of limiting lives to a paywall, why not use opt-in ads which we can click to respawn the character? Also, it'd be better if instead of two movement buttons placed on only one side of the screen, why not make either sides of the screen be for forward move through right screen and backward move through left, and double click for removing the hindrances? Just my two cents, but overall it's a nice game to kill time
The lives rate behind a paywall is a joke.  Nothing but a money grab.  I will be removing the game

Excellent running based game with puzzles to solve. There are ads but that is by choice to enable them otherwise there are no ads. Keeps my attention to continue to keep playing more levels or retry to get all 3 stars. Everytime you die it's a different character but same premise as for as completing the levels.

Really fun game, but once you've got a couple colors going, it doesn't like to click the changer buttons. It also doesn't like when you click the buttons while you're moving. Lots of potential here (Currently at 1000 downloads, so I feel like it's still working out the kinks)

- Enjoy a lively original soundtrack
- Master the ability to switch colors, jump, fly, climb, dodge and more

comments: I think it is a very good game. But i have a few suggestions that you can make to the game. First you should make it where it shift from daytime to nighttime and when it is on nightime you have the choice to turn on the turn on the headlights. Also you should make it where you have 2 different driving controls. Like you should keep the arrows and add a steering wheel. Also, you guys should add a horn with one of the button options. You guys should also make it where you can ride with other people. One last thing guys you should add a boat people can get on and ride. Please add all of this you guys are awesome!

This is a great game for hanging out, practising quick-scoping and all-round fun. I just feel that you guys haven't put enough effort into this, like you just put something down and left it. People love this game! You need to start making it betterand adding new content, or else people will just get bored. But otherwise, it's great for just having fun killing other people ;)

Can you have us have a friend's list to see who's online I bet  that's what people like me want. Also there's  seats in the vehicle. can you make it were  people for the other person .And last can you make a gas bar were we  refill has with our money that would be cool with a update of a donate Bar were in the server we can donate bet. And add newer cars and guns it's fun but and the same time it's boring plz do these.!!!!!!!!!!!

Pretty good game, though there should be a higher emphasis on fighting. We should be able to register accounts, and receive money for our kills. Also, when we kill someone, it should say in chat who we killed. Game has great potential, registering accounts would be nice to so that we can make friends and remember people. :D

I love the game, it is a great time killer, but I have suggestions. First you should add more guns, like pistols, and add grenades. Also have the plane controls more easier to use, I always have difficulty with that. Add more maps, more planes to fly. Make it so it can save the cars or planes you get. I always lose money buying the same car again every time I log back in the game. Other than that, I love the game!

Make a option where you can choose your sensitivity. The sniper Scope is harder to you in with the new one. Make more guns in the game. Finally when you stay still in the game: people, cars, move which makes it harder to shoot. One you run over a player they should die. Please add these stuff to the game for a 5 star rating.

descriptionHTML:
How did you get to this island?? What If it's your last day? It's worse than the apocalypse… Because this isn't just a desert island. You are not alone here... The Island is inhabited by dangerous dinosaurs!!! The Fight for survival has begun...

If you like survival games, The Ark of Craft 2: Jurassic Survival Island is all you need! This is the best survival simulator you’ve ever seen! Survival, craft and hunt are waiting for you on the island. Play free without internet. Open world is here!

Survival Island features:

💎 Mysterious caves: find a dino cave and collect rare resources
Explore ancient caves full of dangerous dinosaurs and rare resources. Discover new species of dinosaurs! Collect rare resources, craft tools and weapons, build your own house in the open world!

🌴New great 3D graphics
Enjoy the newest version of high resolution graphics in 3D. Survival feels more real than ever. Just imagine suddenly finding an island with giant jungle forest and ancient animals. Survival simulator with the best 3D graphics is already here!

🔫 Dozens of new weapons and vital resources
Apocalypse or desert island... anyway, you have to survive. You can craft weapons: axe, bow and arrows. They will help you to hunt for food and protect yourself in the fight. Enjoy survival craft! Be a real dino hunter!

🐲 Evolution goes on
There is a huge collection of dinosaurs and wild animals on this island. You have your best friend - dodo. It will protect you from dangerous Kentrosaurus. Try to tame wild Pterodactyls! Collect all the eggs and get Nasutoceratops!

🔨 Improved crafting, building and fighting skills
Survival games...this is not as easy as it seems. Be brave even if it’s your last day... The Ark 2 enables you to create and craft more advanced resources for building facilities. If you like survival craft, this game is all you need! Explore open world in all possible ways, you are now a true survivor.

comments: Amazing, great! I loooooved it!! I only just installed this and am already in love with it. Awesome job cocoplay and tabtale!! (Just please make some things free. It kinda gets annoying when you have to pay for every single dress, top, etc etc )

I really liked this game but after a week of playing this game when I was going to put make up on the model I couldn't put anything on her it said that I needed to  BUY the full version? What ? Please fix this problem because my WiFi is on but it's still locked

Theres an ad every 5 to 8 seconds. Loved the game, i thought it was very fun but i went crazy with ads. Plus after the fifth girl the game locks you out of a ton products (clothes, makeup, colors, hair, etc) unless you pay for it. Not fair i felt since you already had to buy it with your game cash. So now youre short on cash but cant access anything you bought. All in all. Im deleting it bc the ads killed about half the time i spent playing.

Okay, overall the game is fine. Nearly half of the good things are locked and is available only for people who can pay for it(or at times if you watch the ads). The graphics is pretty good. However, too many ads makes it pretty annoying sometimes.

comments: This is a great game. Things balance out in terms of time and crafting. You can also earn diamonds fairly easily so you don't need to buy anything. The only issues I have is the market place, everything is gone as soon as you open it, even if you opened it exactly when it refreshes.

It an amazing game just wish it would quite lagging and miss connecting. Would be nice is you could sell some of those free gifts you get or the stuff you buy and don't need like the decorations. All they do is stock up and never get used. Be nice to sell them so you can get more money.

Good game to pass time  . Just too expensive to buy new items and also annoyed by the buy but have to build items. Also i just added friends thru d game n would be glad if theres also a lil' chat box or acknowledging box (wanna thank those game friends since i dnt know them personally üòä) . Looking forward to this game being playable offline (my wish) .

Adorable graphics! Great concept. Missed the bar with execution. Feels like they rush you too much right away with what you have to do and the time needed to do it. Not nearly enough slots open to complete orders properly and smoothly.... I have played too many similar games to know that it shouldn't be this frustrating.  Just some minor tweaks needed. I think if I just ignore my customers completely for a couple levels and give myself some good headway it will be more enjoyable but I'm afraid the problem will still persist... With how really cute the graphics are (complete with adorable cows and deeply chickens)I'm very sad that I may just have to look for a better one.

I really love this game and my only problem is with the recent Valentine's quest. I completed 10 tables and out of the ten only received two arrows. This was just in the last hour. Had the same problem yesterday. At this rate I will not be able to get any prizes.

Devs fixed loading issue now game loads fast. All the best parts of games like this are present ...build it, cook it, animals, markets etc. A lot of the products take way too long to produce but  you can watch ads to speed up. Warning! I purchased an item & it did not work. I sent complaint but nothing has been done. Do not purchase items with real money.

comments: Glu games never fail to dissapoint, and Dino Hunter Deadly Shores is no exception. The graphics are satisfying, the weapons are creative and the gameplay is entertaining. I am empathetic, and realize that You need ads to generate income, but the amount of afs in this game is rudiculous Nonetheless, I have had a great experience playing this game, and It never fails to keep me entertained and enthralled. Keep it up!

It is a time killer with some fun for a bit. The graphics are good. My main point of contention is their shady sales practice where they have two GLU credit packs for the same price (say $49.99) one is for 1300 credits and the other for 2500. There is really no difference in the world, except one says credit pack and the other says value pack. It isn't until you get to the payment screen that if you aren't observant that you notice that the "value pack" of 2500 credits for $49.99 is a monthly subscription. They need to clearly state this on the listing so people are well aware before they hit the purchase button. But they won't because they are shady as fu*k

Hi, the game is pretty nice. I have a problem when I select to hunt with a bow for daily missions. Is there a trick to solve this? The problem look like a half of a screen in vertical, has very bad sync with the other half, and is quite impossible to see the monsters; only after I select to zoom, appear for a moment some clear image, but that is not for long...is just impossible to such mission....please fix this.

I've been playing this game since 2016. I know I have had a few different carriers and phones but my stats always begin over. I know you have the means to rollover data therefore for this reason alone l say that you are greedy little men and women.  The game is one of my favorites so there it is. I've spent thousands on this game alone every penny worth it.

I really liked the overall feel of the game, and it isn't too long in loading either. The only thing I don't like is how fast the energy levels wear out. Other than that though it's good, because if you don't have enough money to upgrade to a larger mission, you can do smaller missions to collect more money. :) I would definitely recommend this to gamers.

Great game. Lots of fun to pass the time. I would have given it 5/5 except for the fact that they heavily favor in app purchases and it's about 10 times more difficult to advance without spending real money. But graphics, gameplay, and the concept of the game I give a 10/10!
description: Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.HUNT DINOSAURSJourney to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history.  Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONSKill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONSLoad up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow.  You‚Äôll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIESProgress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICSDynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!‚ÄúIt‚Äôs as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.‚Äù ‚Äì Kotaku ‚Äú‚Ä¶ I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.‚Äù ‚Äì AppSpy ‚ÄúDino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It‚Äôs an easy game to enjoy.‚Äù ‚Äì Gamezebo ‚ÄúDino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äì ModojoPLEASE NOTE:- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.-This game is not intended for children.- Please buy carefully.- Advertising appears in this game.- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. descriptionHTML:
Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.

HUNT DINOSAURS
Journey to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history. Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.

VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONS
Kill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!

EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONS
Load up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow. You’ll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!

MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIES
Progress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!

EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICS
Dynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!

High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

“It’s as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.” – Kotaku

“… I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.” – AppSpy

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It’s an easy game to enjoy.” – Gamezebo

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in…” – Modojo

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
-This game is not intended for children.

- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game’s “Help” feature.

descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to run your very own beauty salon? In Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game your kids can design and create their very own hair styles, or take the ultimate challenge and match their customer's hairstyle of choice perfectly!

Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game is a fun hairdressing simulation game where everyone can create the most beautiful, fashionable hairstyles at the touch of a button!

With two fantastic modes to play, the fun never stops!

Key Features:

FREE MODE
In Free Mode, your hair models are ready to let you go to town on their hair, all you need is your creativity!

Give it a trim, cut it short of leave it long and flowing; the scissors are always at hand.
Smooth and straight is nice, but with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can curl to your heart’s content with a selection of different curling tongs each of which makes a tighter or looser curl!

Don’t want to curl all of the hair? That’s okay, with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can pick and choose which hair to curl and which to leave straight. Cut the front short into bangs and leave the back long as you like!

Accessories make a big impact. Choose from a wide range of beautiful grips, clips, tiaras and cute little animal ears to really make your creations spectacular!

Take a picture and share it with all your friends!

COPY MODE
Are you ready for the ultimate fashion salon challenge? Your customers know exactly what they want and expect you to get it just right!

Follow the guide picture and get to work.

First you need to wash your customer’s hair – lean them back into the basin and soak their hair with the shower, then lather in that shampoo till there’s plenty of bubbles! Rinse it all off again and add some conditioner to make that hair tangle free.

Take a good look at the picture and begin! You’ll be amazed at the kind of hairstyles your customers want, so many different tastes and fashions! But they don’t just want hairstyles, they also want you to do their make-up and for you to pick out the prettiest dress to go with their perfect style makeover!

You’ve got to be on top of your game if you’re going to succeed in the hair salon business but don’t worry, if you make any mistakes you can always use the magic redo cream!

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds

comments: Awesome game. Very nice controls but greedy devs. I spend money in games but to pay 59 sek just to remove ads is too much. And too many ads which spoils the otherwise great game. Either reduce the cost to remove ads or include other benefits to the same cost. The frequency of ads should be reduced.

Fun gameplay, but a bit buggy and confusing when a train is near a switch since you often stop a train when trying to switch it. Difficulty ramps up to insanely unfair after the first few levels. Since the passengers spawn at random even when you're absolutely perfect at switching the trains you still don't often get 3 stars on the level. Getting 3 stars on a level is basically luck at that point.

This game was great for the first few levels, and then some frustrations set in about the design. Some levels are just tough to see which tracks go where because of the nature of the isometric view, but the real deal breaker for me is having to click the arrow to switch a track path. Why can't this be a lever to the side of the track, especially when two path switches overlap? Countless times I've accidentally stopped a train on an intersection instead of switching the track for the next train. It tests your patience instead of your multitasking and tracking abilities. The ads are very, very plentiful. I urge you to continue using the free version if you want to support the devs because they probably get more revenue from ads in the long run than the $5 cost to remove the ads. Potentially great.

Rigged gameplay. I made it thru several levels until I tapped on the train and it didnt stop, resulting in a crash, further resulting in a 30 second ad that I couldn't escape. How convenient. I have noticed more and more developers finding ever-newer ways to slip ads into the games.
Hadn't played it for a while, went back and it had deleted all my progress. Not going to start again, so deleting the app

This game was honestly amazing. I love how it's such a simple game yet it's so much fun to play. The low poly graphics and the music really synchronized and make it so much more better. Even the tutorial, it integrates into the game in a very interesting manner. The only problem was that it lags a bit, but otherwise Northplay, loved it!
description: Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.  Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.  As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.  ‚Ä¢ Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds ‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches ‚Ä¢ Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions ‚Ä¢ Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection ‚Ä¢ Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit ‚Ä¢ Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ ‚Ä¢ Share your most explosive crashes with your friends ‚Ä¢ Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon K√∂lle
descriptionHTML:
Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.

Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.

As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.

• Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds
• Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches
• Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions
• Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection
• Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit
• Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ
• Share your most explosive crashes with your friends
• Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle

comments: If flying a "real rc plane" is like this app why would you bother? I have flown both rc helicopters & basic model planes, this app is nothing like flying a rc plane so far from the real control & feeling of flying a rc plane you might as well sit in a chair shut your eyes & make airplane sounds!

The flight physics are way off. If I have idle power and a nose down attitude my airspeed should be increasing not decreasing.  The rudder is non existent . Deleted after 5 minutes.   From: A real pilot , and Rc flyer
You have only 1 plane. To get the rest of them you have to pay REAL MONEY. This company wants just to take your money. DON'T DOWNLOAD!
You only get one plane...you have to buy remaining planes it is the only problem..but if you are looking to fly a rc plane for first time then this app is very helpful..
I think this is a great game to pass time but the planes are just to expensive. I passed all levels with in 2 days.  It's now time to uninstall and look for another game with less expensive planes.
Game is beat but one thing is bad that is we have only one plane but we want to by a new new plane so we will pay our real money ......so please solve this problem ..

comments: Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

comments: Game started off fine, and it's challenging. I seem to be finding that the higher up in levels you get the more issues there are. Game keeps crashing and restarting, I have a lot of times I don't get my whole free time awarded to me. I am seriously considering uninstalling this game because these issues are taking the fun out of it.

Overall is addicting, but I'm so pissed off that the game keep on crashing at level 754. Whenever I was almost winning, the game will crash. I even rebooted my phone but it still happened! When I was losing that level, the game was totally fine. Thank god there's a 24hr free lives right now, but I will uninstall it if this problem is not rectified asap.

It would be 5 stars but the game pauses and freezes a lot.  When it freezes it takes away a  life, any boosts bought and won't send you to the next level even if you win. It also takes forever to load. Even after installing Google Play Games, it still freezes and takes forever load. pleeeease fix these glitches, I don't want to have to start playing Toy Blast üòê

This game makes it too apparent that they want you to spend money with them. Games are more fun when you get so caught up in them that spending money on them is just an afterthought. This game is designed to stop you from winning in to many different ways. The birds that are supposed to help you only screw up your strategy most of the time, and I have seen bubbles just reappear. Not joking, literally watched them just appear out of nowhere. I have seen too many ways in which a win can be taken away from you. So, it feels a little unfair and forced. I understand it is business, but it seems to be designed to be a little to greedy for my taste.

Terrible freezing,  while playing. In losing lives and boosters.  YOU NEED TO FIX THIS,  IF YOU'RE GOING TO WANT GAMERS TO SPEND MONEY... Update.. Almost a year later, its STILL CRASHING.. Quick question developer... "Do you ever give this app and comments any attention!!??!?!?!"..
My only complaint, the stupid 5 lives thing.  Later in the game when it's tough I end up having to stop playing because I'm out of life.

descriptionHTML:
Blast into a new Angry Birds puzzle adventure game! The birds are trapped inside balloons, and you can bet the pigs are behind it all. Tap matching balloons to blast them to smithereens and free the flock!

Use your balloon-bustin’ skillz to outsmart the pigs and save birds in over 600 egg-celent levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Grab rewards every day in the Daily Quest. Already got ’em? Then go join the weekly events or chase down this month's puzzle pieces. Blasted through those? How about taking on the world in the global leaderboard?

There’s plenty to do, and an ever-growing number of levels to master so get BLASTING!

Features:
· 600+ FUN LEVELS – with more added weekly!
· PICK UP AND PLAY – any time, any place even OFFLINE!
· TEASE YOUR BRAIN – with challenging & strategic gameplay!
· CREATE BOOSTERS – rockets, bombs, laser guns!
· DAILY CHALLENGES – earn free rewards and boosters!
· WEEKLY EVENTS – Mighty League, Treasure Hunt and more!
· PUZZLE CHASE – find pieces to new puzzles every month!
· PLAY WITH FRIENDS – connect to Facebook, yo!
· GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS – earn your spot with high scores!


----------------

Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send us a message! https://support.rovio.com/

----------------

Angry Birds Blast! is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, you’ll have a blast! Get it? I’ll see myself out...

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

The game is kind of fun and the controls are good but it would be better if it was an open world game and you had more freedom to walk around and things to do on your own instead of just following the directions and the goals. Other than that the game is pretty fun but does get boring after awhile since it's not an open world

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you‚Äôre ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that‚Äôs why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you‚Äôre not scared, and you‚Äôre ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn‚Äôt made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don‚Äôt cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

comments: Video adds for mobile and long answer times reslly take the fun out of it. As a f2p player you can duel up to 8 other players. If you are unlucky like me this means you cant play if they take hours to answer 3 questions! (Timewindow to answer: 48 hours) :(

Latest update: The agressive pop up ads are gone and have been replaced by video ads. Even when connected to mobile data services. I wouldn't say this is an improvement. Draining my data volume for advertisement is not nice. It's just greedy. This app is producing so much money anyways, why video ads? Wouldn't normal images be enough?  Update: The agressive advertisement is back and it's worse than ever. There are huge amounts of unauthorised browser popups partly midgame and even when the app is simply running in the background. This needs to be addressed!  Earlier: I like this app a lot. The concept behind it is great and it's great fun to play. The questions are mostly balanced aside from the annoyingly football heavy sports category. Lately though the app kept opening up dubious websitest, usually at the beginning of a round. This is absolutely untolerable (!). It should not have the permission to do this. I've been hoping for the latest fee updates to fix this - they didn't.
Die App macht was sie soll, aber die Menge an Werbung ist sehr anstr√§ngend.  Nach JEDER Runde muss man einen GANZEN Werbespot zu Ende schauen. Dann lieber doch ein Banner.

So viel Werbung !! An sich ein super Spiel, aber tonnenweise Werbung. Macht den gesamten Spielspa√ü kaputt.  Richtig , richtig schlecht gemacht von den Leute , so viel Werbung darein zu packen. 30 sec und keine M√∂glichkeit zu √ºberspringen!!!!!!!! 5 Sterne, sobald weniger Werbung dabei ist.
Too many stupid and irrelevant questions
Mehr Werbung bitte.

descriptionHTML:
Quizduell ist ein intelligentes, farbenfrohes und unterhaltsames soziales Quiz, in dem du deine Freunde und andre Spieler zu einem Wissensduell herausforderst und dabei neue & spannende Fakten lernst!

Quizduell 2.0
• NEUES Design > Frische neue Graphiken, Avatare, Toplisten, Schriften, Interfaces und Farben!

HIGHLIGHTS
• Mehr als 35.000 Text- und Bilderfragen von hoher Qualität, geschrieben vom Quizduell-Team und von unseren eifrigen Quizzern. Wähle aus vielen verschiedenen Kategorien.
• Erklimme die Toplisten - messe dein Wissen mit anderen Top-Quizzern aus dem deutschsprachigen Raum.
• Steuere mit deinen eigenen Quizfragen zu unserem Spiel bei und erhalte eine Belohnung dafür.
• Verbinde deine Accounts aus den sozialen Medien mit Quizduell und lade deine Freunde zu einem Quiz ein.
• Gestalte deinen eigenen Quizduell-Avatar.
• Quizduell bleibt immer aktuell. Neue Text- und Bilderfragen werden täglich hinzugefügt!

Auf zum Quizzen!

www.feomedia.com

comments: Good game however, once you've taken control of all the islands there is little else to keep you interested. I would look at adding more world's and making the trading a real economy by having the ability to buy items and sell them for a profit in different ports. Potentially even have your ports taken over again or mutiny so you need to recapture them.

Overall the game is great. Gameplay is smooth but slow (hey, old ships), making the gameplay calming. Graphics are pleasing to the eyes, though it could still need improvements. Sounds are calming too.   You guys should change the image for the gold coins since it resembles a symbol in One Piece. And also the whale movement could be smoother and slower. You could add more creatures in the ocean in addition to the whale since its just blank at times.

It's a really great game! I'm really looking forward to an update. I think it'd be REALLY helpful to be able to purchase an extra boat that just goes around and picks up boxes.. Having to turn around all the time gets tedious. Also an online pvp would be awesome. Maybe have the ability to make clans with your friends that can attack other clans. I'm looking forward to see what you guys do!

This game is great overall and you have a great sense of progression as your ship gets bigger and faster. The problem is the controls themselves. I found it very hard( I noticed this when I reached HP or ship level 6 ) and sometimes close to impossible to fire at other ship even at point blank range. The game has a very hard time trying to focus on one ship and would often shoot at where the enemy was 3 seconds ago especially when there is more than 3 ships at once which often happens. I would recommend a fire button option to compliment the controls and the gameplay experience. As I said before, it is indeed a very amusing game and would be even more enjoyable with this added feature.

please, please, please. update more maps or make it more challenging, ive already conquered all the islands and there's not much i can do anymore. so please, either more maps, or let others conquer my islands and let me reclaim it. i know you guys can still add up to this already amazing game. also, improve the controls, really cant see much when im steering. but over all, its a really fun, relaxing game. ;) thank you.

One of me and my sister's favourite game. But we wish we could play together same team or against each other with bots. We don't  want to be against online players. If you guys do that I will tell alllllll my friends to play. Anyway great job keep up the work , you guys are greatüòÅ

description: Manage your own smart car wash & gas station to provide car services including washing, paint job and designing. Play Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station and drive luxury car to refill fuel at the highway service station. Get behind the wheel of muscle cars and drive towards the city service station in car wash games 2018. Put pedal to the metal, park smart car inside automatic car wash games for cleanup and do exciting car customization. For complete engine repair & highway service like oil change, maintenance park inside the auto repair shop. Drive smart car around metro city and park at the highway gas station games to refill the petrol in car washing games.  Luxury cars are arriving in the highway service station for cleanup and car customization, so you as car mechanic have a tough job to do. Get behind the wheel to drive and park super muscle cars at the gas station parking. The luxury cars are directly coming from dirt racing tracks and some of them were involved in police car chase. Entertain yourself and take the smart car in repair garage for inspection and complete engine service in car washing games. Check smart car engine, bumper, alloy wheels and rims to ensure it's clean. Exterior rollover smart car wash is automated system where you drive your luxury car inside the bay. Once your police car is in the correct position, a signal informs you to stop. At that point, the muscle car wash equipment moves over your smart car on a track, performing a specific function, such as applying soap and rinsing like other car customization games.After cleanup at the car wash games you will be able to design and customize highway service car the way customers desire. For designing you will be using various vinyl stickers to give incredible look to muscle cars just like in car mechanic simulator 18. Drive luxury car inside the paint shop to change the color and remove stains, rust and scratches. Operate your gas station and complete smart car parking & driving tasks in car customization games. descriptionHTML:
Manage your own smart car wash & gas station to provide car services including washing, paint job and designing. Play Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station and drive luxury car to refill fuel at the highway service station. Get behind the wheel of muscle cars and drive towards the city service station in car wash games 2018. Put pedal to the metal, park smart car inside automatic car wash games for cleanup and do exciting car customization. For complete engine repair & highway service like oil change, maintenance park inside the auto repair shop. Drive smart car around metro city and park at the highway gas station games to refill the petrol in car washing games.

Luxury cars are arriving in the highway service station for cleanup and car customization, so you as car mechanic have a tough job to do. Get behind the wheel to drive and park super muscle cars at the gas station parking. The luxury cars are directly coming from dirt racing tracks and some of them were involved in police car chase. Entertain yourself and take the smart car in repair garage for inspection and complete engine service in car washing games. Check smart car engine, bumper, alloy wheels and rims to ensure it's clean. Exterior rollover smart car wash is automated system where you drive your luxury car inside the bay. Once your police car is in the correct position, a signal informs you to stop. At that point, the muscle car wash equipment moves over your smart car on a track, performing a specific function, such as applying soap and rinsing like other car customization games.

After cleanup at the car wash games you will be able to design and customize highway service car the way customers desire. For designing you will be using various vinyl stickers to give incredible look to muscle cars just like in car mechanic simulator 18. Drive luxury car inside the paint shop to change the color and remove stains, rust and scratches. Operate your gas station and complete smart car parking & driving tasks in car customization games. The car wash station is fully automatic all you need to do is park the luxury car inside car wash and repair games. Simulate your world and tuneup police car engine inside the repair shop garage. The repair shop garage is located next to the paint shop at highway gas station games. This repair shop garage is equipped with all the latest car mechanic simulator tools. This is perfect blend of top rated games like police car parking and smart car wash games.

Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking Game Features:
Challenging time based luxury car washing, refuel and paint job levels
Multiple muscle car customization: suv, sedan, prado, corvette, limo
Realistic highway service gas station environment to drive on
Ultra realistic police car physics with real v8 engine sounds
Smooth vehicle controls for immersive gameplay

Download Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking games now for FREE & entertain yourself!

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

I completely love this game and I would play it again. But I got one problem that one will help me reinstall my Google Play Store. My phone was reset to the factory state. And now there is something wrong with my Google Play Store. And no one will help me reinstall it I have asked for help on several occasions through Google but no reply

It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.

The scene at the end of the level is annoying and takes 5 seconds to play out. Then you have to wait for it to load back to show your stars getting in your chest and your coins. It would be better if it just proceeded to the next level saving about 30 seconds. All that to say, it's an addicting game.

Oh my gosh, this game is so much fun! I have a dentist appointment coming up, so I got this game to settle my nerves. I'm having such a good time playing, I know this will be just the thing to help me out! üòÄ Thank you üòÑ

comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ‚òÜ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

description: Farm SImulator : 2018 Modern Tractor Drive Game 3D is an amazing tractor driving game where user will play the role of village farmer. Complete every interesting mission of modern farmer games. Tractor drive. Be the best tractor parking driver. In the fields parking simulator of crazy tractor farming mania. User will be growing crops on his fields and to complete this process farmer needs a tractor. Become a village farmer and cultivate your crops. In this new farming tractor simulator free game you will drive a harvester, heavy drill machinery, After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. Take a good care of your large farm and use proper farming techniques to obtain a high yield. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. Take the best out of your agricultural career by cultivating your mud farm and take your agricultural career to the peaks. The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides. huge open world of your modern farmland and cultivate or harvest multiple types of crops such as sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, rice, cotton and sunflower. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. This off road tractor land cultivator extreme farming adventure will train you as a pro tractor driver and gives you great tips of agriculture and crops cultivation. The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. This is the perfect farming season so harvest your crops and grow new crops to sell them to market in a village for money and go through the complete process of growing crops. The curvy and sharp turns are supposed to be dangerous when user will drive a loaded cargo tractor trolley over it. descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Go to adventure!

Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware ‚Äì he‚Äôs helping them too!It‚Äôs easy to join in ‚Äì just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. descriptionHTML:
Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.

Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!

It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...

Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.
• Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.
• Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen.
• Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.

This application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4

This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:
playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/

2207 Bridgepointe Parkway
San Mateo, CA 94404
United States
summary: The companion app needed to play Frantics‚Ñ¢ on PlayStation¬Æ4.
title: Frantics

descriptionHTML:
Pick up passengers as a taxi driver, race your way carefully in traffic and drop off passengers at the next bus stop. The more passengers you transport, the more gold you earn!
Experience different cars with various speed and capacity in unique worlds, pick up in game bonuses and try to transport as much passenger as you can.
Pay attention to environment and traffic rules, stay away from other vehicles and try not to crash.
Watch out, don't get caught to tow truck while waiting in the traffic jam!

◉ Easy to play, endless gameplay
◉ 25 different vehicles: Taxi, Sport, Jeep, Truck and many more
◉ 3 unique environments: City, Upstate, Military
◉ Prize Wheel and Daily Prizes
◉ Online Leaderboard & Achievements

description: The present water slide amusement is with zero gravity and it is like a full-fledged feast for the kids who are accustomed of the roller coaster that they avail in the amusement park of the finely and well-tuned amusement park games. This game has been developed by keeping in concern all the fundamental and basic needs of the kids of amusement park rides games who are in the habit of performing different traits of their personalities at a single place without much bothering like the adventure slide of the swimming pool along with spectacular and electrifying actions of the difficult beach stunts followed by the crazy stunts of park games for kids. It is multifaceted with multidimensional features at all levels of concerns of sliding games for kids as it attracts and repels the curiosity and craze of a large number of kids of fun park who are with different mentalities as the action of this slide adventure provides an outlet to almost all of them in this way or the other in this theme park which is purely an unmatched addition in the park games. To be the part of this roller coaster game is just like to enter in the Park Island where the kids have all what they want and desire to have with an easy access and without doing some extra effort like realistic slide adventure, tricky water boat, mind blowing water racing, curvy and zigzagging water slide and state to the art water surfing. Apart from this long list of the different availabilities, this water slide simulator has much more for the kids of summer sports games who really want to relish their appetite as water surfer as there are a series of uphill water slides which are unique in their placement with many other water slides of rollercoaster games.  The kids can relish themselves from different kinds of rides in this water park which all are very tricky and full with different simulations of slide games. There is pendulum ride with zero gravity where the player can swing himself as he is hanging like a pendulum of water sports. Bumper boats and drop tower of water park games are also at the choice of the player and he can even go forward from these rides and can enjoy the water ride and mechanical bull of water racing games. This list ends not here as the player has train ride and swing boat which he can select as the future course in this water splash of water slide games. After undergoing the exploit and ambiances of this game, the kids will forget the static and boring experience which they used to confront in the roller coaster and swimming pool of traditional water slide games. Come and be the part of this ecstasy and avail the opportunity to adore the latest and the most groundbreaking savor of water sports games.

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

http://www.rogue-games.co.uk/

i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

descriptionHTML:
Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...

Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼

🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life
🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels
🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand
🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places
🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others
🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room
🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day
🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved ones

Will you be there for Emily when she needs you most?

Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...

On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶

Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!

Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

Follow Emily on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeliciousGames/

Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:
