comments: Ridiculiusly easy and short. Read few comments and must agree - you either see the path from the very start or just randomly stumble upon the flag at the end. only thing thats challenging are the controls, rotation and light/shading. ultra annoying in few last stages.

Looks like monument Valley, but nowhere near as challenging. The most difficult thing is getting the controls to work - the character movement doesn't flow, and it's near impossible to get it to recognise the two finger swipes for rotation. Once you get the hang of it the puzzles are just not challenging enough.

I downloaded this thinking it would be kind of like Monument valley, but ended up being really disappointed. There's really no difficulty to it- the only chance you'd be confused is when you think it would be difficult but it ends up being easy. The graphics LOOK ok, but the animations are really slow and unfitting to the style. Eh, don't recommend.
I will have to upgrade to the paid version for new levels. I had fun going through the free version. Stage 1 was pretty easy but stage 2 began getting harder and harder. Loved it

I'm stuck at number 20 because he won't move in the direction I need. I got a hint to be sure but, even the arrow pointed the way he won't move. It's like he's walking into a wall that isn't there. It's disappointing because, with better controls, and different shading of the planes (checkerboard makes it confusing. Shades if solid colors is ideal with perspective, especially forced)...this game is addictive and extremely likeable. But, I had to give mist if it 2 stars, and that was generous. I hope to be able to update it soon.

This game is okay for killing time, but others definitely take priorty over it. It's simple, but not in a good way. The only things that make the levels hard to complete shouldn't even be a factor. The colors can make it hard to tell what you are looking at half the time. When you turn the level it won't go a full 360 without some weird manuevering making it hard to keep track of what you're doing. Sometimes it takes a couple tries to get the character to move insread of walking in place. And some obstacles that you can move over in some places, it doesn't let you in others.  So in general, the majority of the time you spend completing each level is comprised of overcoming the issues with the game, and not based on difficulty. Like I said, if you have nothing else to play, it's a good time killer. Otherwise, I'm not a huge fan.

descriptionHTML:
Tom, a Genius School graduate, is looking for his dream job. What’ll it be? Astronaut? Firefighter? Pilot? Guess again… he’s decided to become a superstar hairdresser! Only problem is, his bosses don’t let him touch actual hair… unless it’s on the floor. Poor Tom is only allowed to stick to menial tasks like scrubbing floors and answering phones. Play this mischievous hairdressing game to help Tom cut his way from “barberchop” around the corner to world-class designer hair salons… all while avoiding his bosses’ watchful eye.

Cheating Tom graduated Genius School. Now he’s got to enter the real world and get a job. So his days of sneaking around are probably over, right? WRONG. As they say, “once a cheater, always a cheater.” Play this game to help Tom become an amazing hairstylist without getting caught by his annoying bosses who are determined to keep him sweeping the floors day after day.

Features:
> Help Tom sneak his way from hair salon to hair salon!
> Hurry up and get playing! You’ve got 25 different hairstyles to master as you play this crazy game!
> Make sure he cuts and styles customers’ hair as quickly as possible before his boss notices.
> Tons of challenging levels & supercool game play modes for ultra sneakiness.
> Score power-ups and collect coins to become sneakier than ever.
> WARNING: You may encounter some extremely peculiar customers…!
> Chop-chop! Cut that hair as fast as you can, and make sure the customers are satisfied, OR ELSE!
> Choose your game avatar - Tom or Taffy – and get cutting!
> Dress Tom and Taffy up in crazy costumes.

descriptionHTML:
How exciting! Kiki is going shopping with Mama Panda! It means the freedom to explore, only if he can stay out of trouble! See the problems he will run into! Perhaps, you can give him a big hand!

Fun features:
- Easy concepts with child-friendly gameplay
- 4 independent scenes with fun interactions
- Silly and entertaining animations!

With freedom comes responsibility. Our goal is to bring safety awarenesses to children. They will relate safety tips to the situations they see and catch all the poor behaviors acted out by our silly panda Kiki. Maybe they will pay more attention to safety the next time they go out, too!

-- -- --

Design concepts:
We focus on inspirational learning
We focus on skill-building
We focus on bringing fun contents to our young audience
Take the baby bus for an unique learning experience!

The series introduction:
BabyBus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6.

The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers.

description: Business Inc. is a Winner of the 2016 PMI Continuing Professional Education Product of the Year Award!!!Business Inc. is a business strategy game where you are in charge of running a company that develops mobile games. Your end goal is to expand your business as much as you can to come out on top as the leader of the mobile entertainment market.3 difficulty levels of game play, over 15 employees, and an endless number of projects to be run. The game simulates small projectized organization, making profits on projects.Additionally, the game offers predefined Startup scenario with more than 100 projects, more than a dozen people, 11 difficulty levels, hundreds of events and news from the world of project management will provide entertainment as well as a few days of gaming and learning. The game introduces some basic terms of project management, PMI, PMP, PRINCE2, PMBOK Guide, and Scrum.Test yourself out as a project manager, use your resources as best as you can and earn a fortune. You can train people and influence their motivation to increase efficiency and reduce risk. Each project has planned budget, revenue, risk, and deadline. Select profitable projects and optimally allocate people at them to earn as much as possible. The Business Inc. provides a business education in a fun way. However, the game is difficult. If you have problems finishing it, check our FB website for tips and news: https://www.facebook.com/bincgame
descriptionHTML:
Business Inc. is a Winner of the 2016 PMI Continuing Professional Education Product of the Year Award!!!

Business Inc. is a business strategy game where you are in charge of running a company that develops mobile games. Your end goal is to expand your business as much as you can to come out on top as the leader of the mobile entertainment market.

3 difficulty levels of game play, over 15 employees, and an endless number of projects to be run. The game simulates small projectized organization, making profits on projects.

Additionally, the game offers predefined Startup scenario with more than 100 projects, more than a dozen people, 11 difficulty levels, hundreds of events and news from the world of project management will provide entertainment as well as a few days of gaming and learning.

The game introduces some basic terms of project management, PMI, PMP, PRINCE2, PMBOK Guide, and Scrum.

Test yourself out as a project manager, use your resources as best as you can and earn a fortune. You can train people and influence their motivation to increase efficiency and reduce risk. Each project has planned budget, revenue, risk, and deadline. Select profitable projects and optimally allocate people at them to earn as much as possible.

The Business Inc. provides a business education in a fun way.

However, the game is difficult. If you have problems finishing it, check our FB website for tips and news: https://www.facebook.com/bincgame

description: You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.The game will encounter various switches, and portals, with which you can travel. Also in the game there are mini games that diversify the whole game process. For example, in one mini-game you have to climb up a large tree, avoiding spines. In another mini-game you have to work with different blocks to build a solid bridge and pass it.Good luck to you free game.
descriptionHTML:
You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.
In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.
Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.
The game will encounter various switches, and portals, with which you can travel. Also in the game there are mini games that diversify the whole game process. For example, in one mini-game you have to climb up a large tree, avoiding spines. In another mini-game you have to work with different blocks to build a solid bridge and pass it.
Good luck to you free game.

descriptionHTML:
You were handcuffed and sent to a high security prison for a crime that you didn't commit. In prison that sort's a sprawling labyrinth of gangsters, murders, lowlifes, drug dealers and thieves you have to find way out, and maybe then you'll get a chance to prove your innocence. description: This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog‚Äôs race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. You have to win the rush in any case in required time periods otherwise you can loose the mission if opponent eliminates you first. On the other hand after completing the mission you can get score which can help you to unlock new fast and multi races speedy dogs. Feel the thrill & excitement and enjoy the real bulldog race along with multiple levels. So you have to win the race first to unlock next levels. You have to know that which rider chases the destination first will lead to win. This racing game is a combination of multiple and different races dogs. The racing tracks are especially designed for dog rush. Amazing realistic background sound effects, stunning 3D graphics, smooth control and multiple camera angles will help you to control the game with different angles. You can enjoy with this modern racing practice. This dog race both kids and adults can play easily. Features:Attractive and adventurous game playAmazing multiple races dogsMultiple exciting levels Realistic background sound effectsSmooth and easy controlThrilling and multiple challenges Amazing stunning 3d graphicsRealistic running tracks
descriptionHTML:
This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog’s race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.

Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. You have to win the rush in any case in required time periods otherwise you can loose the mission if opponent eliminates you first. On the other hand after completing the mission you can get score which can help you to unlock new fast and multi races speedy dogs.

Feel the thrill & excitement and enjoy the real bulldog race along with multiple levels. So you have to win the race first to unlock next levels. You have to know that which rider chases the destination first will lead to win. This racing game is a combination of multiple and different races dogs. The racing tracks are especially designed for dog rush. Amazing realistic background sound effects, stunning 3D graphics, smooth control and multiple camera angles will help you to control the game with different angles. You can enjoy with this modern racing practice. This dog race both kids and adults can play easily.

Attractive and adventurous game play
Amazing multiple races dogs
Multiple exciting levels
Realistic background sound effects
Smooth and easy control
Thrilling and multiple challenges

description: Horse survival awaits! Play as numerous horse breeds from zebra to a fantasy unicorn, explore different lands, complete quests and make a horse family in a new animal survival simulator. Enjoy fun and freedom of wild horse in World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator, ride with your herd and fight for survival!In World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator you will:CHOOSE YOUR HORSEFrom pony or zebra, to fantasy unicorn or pegasusEXPLORE DIFFERENT LANDSFight for survival from African Savannah to a fantasy realmCOMPLETE QUESTSEach horse has its own adventure - complete them all!RAISE A FAMILYFind mates for your horse, make foals and ride togetherLots of horse breeds!Fight for survival as any horse you want in our simulator - from pony or zebra, to exotic unicorn or pegasus. Each horse has it‚Äôs own habitat and quests. Playing as every horse has a load of fun, so try them all in our animals survival simulator!Making a horse family!Fighting for survival together with a horse herd is much easier! Find a horse of your breed, be it zebra, pony or unicorn, to make a herd and raise foals in the survival simulator. To make your horse herd bigger, remember to make your own horse stronger!Explore different lands!Each horse lives in its own land. Go to the hills with any simple horse, to Savannah with zebra or African horse and to a fantasy land with pegasus, unicorn or pony. Horse survival simulator has a lot of places to go and thing to do for your herd!Ride through the different lands with your horse herd in our new horse survival game - World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator!
descriptionHTML:
Horse survival awaits! Play as numerous horse breeds from zebra to a fantasy unicorn, explore different lands, complete quests and make a horse family in a new animal survival simulator. Enjoy fun and freedom of wild horse in World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator, ride with your herd and fight for survival!

In World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator you will:

CHOOSE YOUR HORSE
From pony or zebra, to fantasy unicorn or pegasus

EXPLORE DIFFERENT LANDS
Fight for survival from African Savannah to a fantasy realm

COMPLETE QUESTS
Each horse has its own adventure - complete them all!

RAISE A FAMILY
Find mates for your horse, make foals and ride together

Lots of horse breeds!
Fight for survival as any horse you want in our simulator - from pony or zebra, to exotic unicorn or pegasus. Each horse has it’s own habitat and quests. Playing as every horse has a load of fun, so try them all in our animals survival simulator!

Making a horse family!
Fighting for survival together with a horse herd is much easier! Find a horse of your breed, be it zebra, pony or unicorn, to make a herd and raise foals in the survival simulator. To make your horse herd bigger, remember to make your own horse stronger!

Explore different lands!
Each horse lives in its own land. Go to the hills with any simple horse, to Savannah with zebra or African horse and to a fantasy land with pegasus, unicorn or pony. Horse survival simulator has a lot of places to go and thing to do for your herd!

Ride through the different lands with your horse herd in our new horse survival game - World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator!
recentChanges: A big addition to the herd comes with a major update including:
- New big locations: hillside and Savannah
summary: Join the biggest horse herd of the world in a new animal survival simulator!
title: World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator
